text: The train stationb is very nice. I always take the train from there to go Mcpherson to change to the Circle Line. The train is very spacious and there are alot of empty seats in the morniong.
Looks nice. Reminds me a bit of the mrt at changi.
New setup bag scanning system. Crew are polite. Feel comfortable while doing the scan process.

The station staff went extra mile to barricade the openings to prohibit carousell transaction without tapping out.

The security staff will also enforce it.

The station master Singarayer Darren Shailendran of Geylang Bahru MRT station is most helpful. I was trying to get a map of 175 bus from Pasir Panjang from his colleague when Mr Darren approached me with a MRT map. He taught me how to  travel in the shortest time possible from Pasir Panjang to Geylang. I really appreciate his help. So far he is the best station master I have met.
Yours sincerely
Eileen ong
